page.title: 16TOURISM IN DRUMNADROCHIT
page.content: The main tourist attractions in {Drumnadrochit}are the legendary Loch Ness{"MONSTER"}and the{Urquhart {Castle}.In the village there is an exhibition where there are models of the loch & photos and video films of the{"MONSTER".}The castle is visited by lots of tourists because it is very old and has a very good vantage point over the loch.The tourists also like the impressive tower and spiral stone stairs and the amazing way the castle was built stone by stone.Other people come to {Drumnadrochit}to go horse riding at Borlum farm riding school.Many come to cruise on cabin cruisers on the loch and maybe to do a spot of fishing. Finaly many come for the local hill-walking and to admire the beautiful scenery and wildlife of the area.
